title: Share of automobile sales in China in 2010 and 2025 , by segment
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely Premium class passenger cars/ limousines (E/F), medium-sized vehicles (C/D), and Compact and mini cars (A/B). The y axis represents Share in total sales and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Premium class passenger cars/ limousines (E/F), medium-sized vehicles (C/D), and Compact and mini cars (A/B) are roughly constant,  throughout the Year

The lines ordered according to average values of Share in total sales in descending order is: 1. medium-sized vehicles (C/D), 2. Compact and mini cars (A/B), and lastly, 3. Premium class passenger cars/ limousines (E/F).
Overall across the Year, medium-sized vehicles (C/D) mostly maintained the highest Share in total sales when compared to others with a mean value of 57.0, and it peaked at 2010.
Followed by Compact and mini cars (A/B) which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 36.5 Share in total sales,reaching its highest point  at 2025 with a value of 37.0.
The botommost line, Premium class passenger cars/ limousines (E/F),  has a mean of 6.5, and peaked at 2025.
